ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Glow Face Cream

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, jojoba esters, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, glycerin, olus oil, dicaprylyl ether, caprylic/capric triglycerides, undecane, aqua/water/eau, tridecane, zea

/eau, tridecane, zea mays (corn) starch, behenyl behenate, polyhydroxystearic acid, polyglyceryl-6 laurate, polyglyceryl-10 oleate, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, panthenol, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, sorbitan palmitate, hydrolyzed soy protein, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, palmaria palmata (dul

almaria palmata (dulse) extract, glycogen, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, magnolol, honokiol, rice amino acids, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed adansonia digitata (baobab) seed extract, proline

Directions: Push up tube. In the morning, apply evenly to a clean face and massage until completely absorbed. Use ou

ely absorbed. Use our face serum as a first step for best results.

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
